The nonsuch professor in his Meridian splendor, or the singular actions of sanctified Christians. Laid open in seaven sermons at Allhallows church in the wall, London. / By William Secker preacher of the gospel. Secker, William, d. 1681?
[28], 320, 341-434, [6] p.
Printed by M.S. for Thomas Parkhurst, to be sold at his shpo at the three crowns, over against the great conduit in Cheapside., London, : 1660.
Text is continuous despite pagination. With a six page publisher's advertisement at end. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octob:". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
